Ministerial.definition: being or having the characteristics of an act or duty prescribed by law as part of the duties of an administrative office 2

1.definition: being or having the characteristics of an act or duty prescribed by law as part of the duties of an administrative office

2.definition: relating to or being an act done after ascertaining the existence of a specified state of facts in obedience to legal and esp. statutory mandate without exercise of personal judgment or discretion see alsocompare
